employmentEarningsHours.typeOfWork: Starship Captain - Command duties including exploration and diplomatic missions
employmentEarningsHours.timeLost: 30 days due to service-related medical conditions

employmentConcessions.concessions: Flexible scheduling for medical appointments and therapy sessions related to service-connected disabilities
